# Discrete Uniform

> Discrete uniform distribution.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var discreteUniform = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dists/discrete-uniform' );
```

#### discreteUniform

Discrete uniform distribution.

```javascript
var dist = discreteUniform;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

```javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();

console.log( getKeys( discreteUniform ) );
```
